about_the_game:
The main character, Aika, works hard to make money for her boyfriend.
She has a job at an underground casino that only rich people go to,
usually working as a bunny girl dealer.

A crazy gambler showed up out of nowhere.
To keep the casino from going under...
she has to use her body as a bet?!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or for viewing at work:
sexual content, voice
All characters in this soundtrack are over the age of 18.
